fields.description:
For example, If I specify three servers in config for zookeeper, and any of them not working during 
`storm nimbus`
then nimbus fails to start at all - 

Can this be avoided somehow?
If one of zookeeper servers failed, then I had to reconfigure all storm instances to simply start it and connect to working zk servers.
